function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of travel history information from patients","Impact":"Inability to control for infections obtained away from place of residence","Mitigation":"Collecting travel history information from patients to improve accuracy of transmission mapping","Technologies":"Data collection tools, electronic medical records","People":"Patients, healthcare providers","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, government health departments"},{"Description":"Use of covariate data from populated areas with confirmed cases","Impact":"Potential bias in transmission mapping and environmental characterization","Mitigation":"Incorporating data from a wider range of locations to capture diverse environmental conditions","Technologies":"GIS mapping, spatial analysis tools","People":"Research team, data analysts","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Exclusion of locations with few cases from mapping analysis","Impact":"Potential misrepresentation of local transmission patterns","Mitigation":"Including locations with few cases and examining sensitivity of outputs to their exclusion","Technologies":"Statistical analysis software, mapping tools","People":"Epidemiologists, research team","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
